Hypothalamus of WHS11.Definition: Delineation of hypothalamus in Waxholm mouse brain atlas, as seen in T1 and T2*	weighted volumes.  As seen in sagittal: bounded dorsally by thalamus. Various features such as contrast between tissues, contours followed from adjacent structures and fiat boundaries as contour extensions visualized in  3D.  Excludes part of fornix lying in the hypothalamus.
